channel.title: Rule for router
channel.description: i dont know how to set the rule for the router linksys its very confusing. when i go there its so much different from what the ultimate guide says. anyone know what to do please tell me[br][size=1]Posted on: January 18, 2007, 09:31:33 PM[/size][hr]i even went to the port foward thing like he said but theres no runescape thing and i read all the manuals for my router

item.title: Rule for router
item.dc:creator: @csrsniper254 csrsniper254
item.description:
@csrsniper254 wrote:

K. Access the web based utility. 192.168.2.1 in the address bar. It will ask for username and password. Type admin as the password no username. Click applications ang gaming. In the first box type your server name. IE: my server. Then put 43594 for start and 43594 for end. Next box put both. Check enable. Press save settings.

Read full topic

item.title: Rule for router
item.dc:creator: @eclipse245 eclipse245
item.description:
@eclipse245 wrote:

ok well usually go into ur address bar and type: 192.168.0.1 and if that doesnt work type 192.168.1.1
After that you should get a “sign-in” message the username is usually “admin” and leave the password blank, if that doesn’t work, leave the username blank and for the password type in admin.

When you get in you should click “Application(s)” and then go to “gaming” if u dont have “gaming” then find a place where you can insert a port or “open” a port. The port that you need to open, its default, is: 43594

Enable the port and for the “schedule” click the “always” option, then apply the changes and DONE!

If this did not help then please look at “router rule set-up tuts”

Read full topic
